title: Kashimashi: Girl Meets Girl (Girl Meets Girl)
synopsis: Hazumu was a shy boy who enjoyed gardening, collecting herbs, and long walks in the mountains. One day he finally worked up the courage to confess his love to Yasuna, but she rejected him.
